attributes.action: Use the proposed planning regime to decrease environmental impact of new homes
attributes.additional_details: To act in a way that recognises the Climate Emergency declared by Parliament.
attributes.background: Amend the proposed planning legislation to ensure local authorities impose strong environmentally friendly clauses , eg ev charging points, solar panels and heat pumps in planning permissions for large housing scemes.

rejection.details:
We understand you are concerned about the environmental impact of new homes, however it's not clear by how much, or to what level, you want this impact of new homes to be reduced to. It is also not clear whether you want each of the technologies you mention to be required, and if not, which would be required, for all new homes.

You may like to sign this petition which calls for a very similar action:

'Require all newly built homes to be Carbon Neutral by 2030': https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/582764
